column1: Smoque BBQ////Smoque BBQ has some really tasty BBQ! My husband and I have tried their pulled pork
column4: and of course- BRISKET. It's definitely our go to when we are really craving BBQ. We would have it more often but the wait
column5: even when calling in orders ahead of time
column6: can be a little lengthy. Some of the sides (mac
column8: beans) can be hit or miss! Recently had the peach cobbler and the peaches had a strong tinny taste. Service is always friendly
column9: and the meats are always good!
